properties.Name: Invoice
properties.Description: A document presented to customers for products delivered or services performed.

Columns.Name: InvoiceId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Invoice.

Columns.Name: CustomerAccountId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer Account.

Columns.Name: InvoiceDate
Columns.Description: The date that the invoice was issued.

Columns.Name: InvoiceToName
Columns.Description: The name of the person invoiced.

Columns.Name: InvoiceToPartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.

Columns.Name: InvoiceToLocationId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Location.

Columns.Name: InvoiceToTelephoneNumber
Columns.Description: The invoice-to contact telephone number.

Columns.Name: InvoiceToFaxNumber
Columns.Description: The invoice-to contact fax number.

Columns.Name: InvoiceToEmailAddress
Columns.Description: The invoice-to contact email address.

Columns.Name: InvoiceNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the Invoice.

Columns.Name: TotalInvoiceProductAmount
Columns.Description: The invoice value amount related equal to the (number of unit products) * (unit sale price)

Columns.Name: TotalInvoiceChargesAmount
Columns.Description: The total amount of charges invoiced.

Columns.Name: TotalInvoiceAdjustmentsAmount
Columns.Description: The total amount of adjustments invoiced.

Columns.Name: TotalInvoiceTaxesAmount
Columns.Description: The total amount of invoiced taxes.

Columns.Name: TotalInvoiceAmount
Columns.Description: The total amount invoiced.

Columns.Name: InvoiceModeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of the Invoice Mode.

Columns.Name: IsoCurrencyCode
Columns.Description: The ISO 4217 currency code.

Columns.Name: InvoiceStatusId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Invoice Status.

Columns.Name: IsoLanguageId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an ISO Language.

Columns.Name: OrderId
Columns.Description: The unique number that identifies an Order.
